DMSdescription: An electronic document flow system based on a private blockade. This is a set of processes for creating, processing, managing, transmitting, receiving, storing, using and destroying electronic documents that are performed using integrity checking and, if necessary, confirming the fact of obtaining such documents.
blockchainDescription: This is a distributed database that supports a constantly growing list of so-called blocks.
fabricDescription: This is a closed block-network, which IBM and Digital Asset have begun to develop, which provides the ability to create a modular architecture with the distribution of roles between the nodes of the network, execute smart contracts (in Fabric they are called "chained code"), a flexible mechanism for reaching consensus and other services .
IPFSdescription: This is a protocol and data dissemination system based on the concept of identification of hash data, which is calculated and accordingly depends on their internal value.
smallDataAlert: The data entered is too small
largeDataAlert: The data entered is too large
smallPasswordAlert: Password must be at least 8 characters long
name: Name
title: Title
author: Author
recruitmentOrderDescription: A form for recruiting a new worker according to form № П-1
workReportDescription: A report about the manufactured products by the worker for a certain period of time
monthlyWageReportDescription: Salary report for all employees of the company as of a certain month
calculationOfWage: about the calculation of monthly wages
